descrip: GCS helps customers add ArcGIS metric data to their Enterprise health monitoring dashboards. Configuring Splunk to consume ArcGIS log files, GCS can extract ArcGIS metrics using Splunk. In addition, GCS ingests additional ArcGIS metrics via ArcGIS APIs into Splunk for more detailed analysis of operations.
title: Splunk and ArcGIS GCS is a Geospatial Information Technology Services Company
